definition[0]: when you form ideas or opinions without having very much information to base them on
example[0]: What she said was pure conjecture.
example[1]: There has been some conjecture about a possible merger.
definition[1]: an idea or opinion formed by guessing
example[2]: My results show that this conjecture was, in fact, correct.
definition[2]: to form an idea or opinion without having much information to base it on
example[3]: It seems reasonable to conjecture that these conditions breed violence.
